==Profile==
Tariq scams the traveler into giving him 500,000 [[mora]]. However, Alhaitham reveals that Tariq is a fraud and gets him to return that mora. Tariq then challenges Alhaitham to a duel. But at the duel, the traveler and Alhaitham defeat Tariq and his acquaintances.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Through Mists of Smoke and Forests Dark}}</ref>
